adjectives.description: viewsome (comparative more viewsome, superlative most viewsome)

entries.meaning: (chiefly dialectal) Commanding a good view; attractive; comely; neat
examples: "She hes, Reuben, she hes ; an' she's a viewsome lass an' all; an' she's a waäy o' deäin' things like thy muther had ; an' if she'd a bit o' brass, Ah wad niver hä' said a wod. [...]"
